our_story.title: Our Story
our_story.text: Luminary was founded with a desire to create a space where elevated cuisine feels intimate and welcoming.

chef_text:
Chef Philosophy
Executive Chef Brie Lumière builds each dish around the idea of illumination, revealing the full potential of an ingredient through precision, contrast, and clarity. Combining inspiration from the generosity from the land and sea, she hones in on sharpening flavors, refining textures, and composing plates that allow each ingredient to be seen, tasted, and understood.
our_story_text:
Our Story
Luminary is an approachable,  fine-dining experience with rustic textures and celestial inspiration. Guided by the vision of our founder, John Luminary, here our seasonally driven menu is informed by the surrounding environment, forest, field, and stream.

chef_philosophy.title: Chef Philosophy
chef_philosophy.text: Our philosophy centers around precision, seasonal ingredients, and emotional storytelling through food.

hero_title: Celestial in spirit. Precise in execution.
hero_description:
Through thoughtful technique and carefully sourced ingredients,
each dish is designed to reveal depth, contrast, and luminous discovery.

hero.title: Celestial in spirit. Precise in execution.
hero.description: Through thoughtful technique and carefully sourced ingredients, each dish is designed to feel refined yet warm.
